meanings.sent1: The doctor sadly informed the patient that his illness was cureless.
meanings.sent2: The disease had progressed to a cureless stage, leaving no room for treatment.
meanings.sent3: Despite trying various remedies, the stubborn stain on the shirt remained cureless.
meanings.sent4: The crack in the vase was so deep and cureless, it could never be repaired.
meanings.sent5: The old, abandoned house had a sense of cureless decay, beyond any restoration.
